class PCTHierarchy[source]

PCTHierarchy(rows=1, cols=1, name='pcthierarchy', links='sparse', history=False, **pargs)

A hierarchical perceptual control system, of PCTNodes.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
hpct = PCTHierarchy(2,2)
hpct.hierarchy

[]

[[<pct.nodes.PCTNode at 0x2ab8403bd48>, <pct.nodes.PCTNode at 0x2ab8403b648>],
 [<pct.nodes.PCTNode at 0x2ab8403be08>, <pct.nodes.PCTNode at 0x2ab84059988>]]
